welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Ginsheim-Gustavsburg! This beautiful city is known for its picturesque landscape, rich history and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Base Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Air Base Airport, primarily used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport, handling both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Frankfurt International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal of Frankfurt International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
